page.title: 10FARMS IN HUSBANDS BOSWORTH
page.content: Most of the land round Husbands Bosworth is farmland.{Mr Garner}farms quite alot of it.He owns 250 acres and rents between 150 and 200 acres,from Mr. Elliot who lives in the village, Mr. Brown from Lubenham, Mr. Holyland and Mr. Lawrence from Mowsley and Mr. Maxwell who lives at Bosworth Hall. He rents out one of his buildings as a pig-farm. 160 acres of his land is for crops and the rest (about 250 acres) is for grazing. He owns about 150 dairy cows and about 60 followers (young calves or heifers)and 280 ewes and their lambs. Mr.Garner employs about 5 people but they aren't all regular, some are on work experience. {Mr.Garner's family have been farming {in the village since about 1932}and since then they have built it up to what it is now.His father shared the farm with Mr. Marsh.
